nodes.name: globalConstraintsCount

devdoc.details: A controller controls the organizations tokens, reputation and avatar. It is subject to a set of schemes and constraints that determine its behavior. Each scheme has it own parameters and operation permissions.

params._globalConstraint: the address of the global constraint to be added.

params._from: The address that will lose the reputation

externalTokenApproval(address,address,ui.details: externalTokenApproval approve the spender address to spend a specified amount of tokens     on behalf of msg.sender.

params._externalToken: the address of the Token Contract
params._value: the amount of ether (in Wei) which the approval is referring to.

externalTokenTransfer(address,address,ui.details: send some amount of arbitrary ERC20 Tokens

params._externalToken: the address of the Token Contract
params._value: the amount of ether (in Wei) to send

externalTokenTransferFrom(address,addres.details: transfer token "from" address "to" address     One must to approve the amount of tokens which can be spend from the     "from" account.This can be done using externalTokenApprove.

params._externalToken: the address of the Token Contract
params._from: address of the account to send from
params._value: the amount of ether (in Wei) to send

genericCall(address,bytes,address,uint25.details: perform a generic call to an arbitrary contract

params._data: ABI-encoded contract call to call `_contract` address.
params._value: value (ETH) to transfer with the transaction

genericCall(address,bytes,address,uint25.return: bool -success        bytes  - the return value of the called _contract's function.

globalConstraintsCount(address).details: globalConstraintsCount return the global constraint pre and post count

metaData(string,address).details: metaData emits an event with a string, should contain the hash of some meta data.

params._metaData: a string representing a hash of the meta data

mintReputation(uint256,address,address).details: Mint `_amount` of reputation that are assigned to `_to` .

params._paramsHash: a hashed configuration of the usage of the scheme
params._permissions: the permissions the new scheme will have

params._globalConstraint: the address of the global constraint to be remove.

params._amountInWei: the amount of ether (in Wei) to send

upgradeController(address,address).details: upgrade the Controller     The function will trigger an event 'UpgradeController'.

params._newController: the address of the new controller.

devdoc.title: Controller contract
